mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.userid AS "userid", a.couponid AS "couponid", a.couponorgid AS "couponorgid", a.name AS "name", a.facevalue AS "facevalue", a.orgid AS "orgid", a.orgname AS "orgname", a.startdate AS "startdate", a.enddate AS "enddate", a.type AS "type", a.status AS "status"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_usercoupon( id, userid, couponid, couponorgid, name, facevalue, orgid, orgname, startdate, enddate, type, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userid}, #{couponid}, #{couponorgid}, #{name}, #{facevalue}, #{orgid}, #{orgname}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{type}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_usercoupon SET userid = #{userid}, couponid = #{couponid}, couponorgid = #{couponorgid}, name = #{name}, facevalue = #{facevalue}, orgid = #{orgid}, orgname = #{orgname}, startdate = #{startdate}, enddate = #{enddate}, type = #{type}, status = #{status}, WHERE id = #{id}
